question: Which Indian state announced free data card to college students for attending online classes?
explanation:
The Tamil Nadu government is to provide free data cards of 2 GB per day to college students to enable them attend online classes till April 2021.
The data cards will be provided to over 9 lakh students studying in government and aided Arts and Sciences colleges, engineering colleges and polytechnic institutions. The Electronics Corporation of Tamil Nadu (ELCOT) will implement the scheme for self-finance college students.
